title: Getting Started with Article Recommendation System
description: A comprehensive guide to setting up and using an article recommendation system in your application.
author: Documentation Team

blocks.content: This guide will help you set up and use the Article Recommendation System effectively. Follow the steps below to get started.

Node.js
Package Manager (npm or yarn)
TypeScript
Follow these steps to set up the project:

Clone the Repository
Install Dependencies
Set Up Configuration
Prepare JSON Files
To use the getRecommendedArticles function, follow this example:
You have now set up the Article Recommendation System in your application. For further customization and advanced features, refer to the official documentation.
